price: 26 Je me suis donc saisi des impies, manifestant ainsi Mon immense réprobation.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
